label: Vintage and Antique Furniture
description: Furniture items that are at least 20 years old and have a unique style or historical significance.
intents: Find unique furniture pieces with character.
Decorate a home with vintage or antique furniture.

subcategories.label: Tables
subcategories.description: Flat-topped furniture with one or more legs, used as a surface for working at, eating from or on which to place things.

subcategories.label: Chairs
subcategories.description: A seat for one person, typically with a back and four legs.

subcategories.label: Storage
subcategories.description: Furniture items used for storing things.

subcategories.label: Beds
subcategories.description: A piece of furniture for sleep or rest, typically a framework with a mattress.

subcategories.label: Desks
subcategories.description: A piece of furniture with a flat or sloped surface and typically drawers, at which one can read, write, or do other work.

subcategories.label: Accessories
subcategories.description: Small items that are added to a room for decoration or convenience.
